name: Premiumize.me
description: *currently does not include a free service - needs a paid Premiumize.me membership!*  Premiumize.me lets you remotely download and collect files from the biggest file and video services of the world.  Features:  *Access and manage your cloud Easily browse and manage your cloud content on your phone just like you would on your desktop or browser.  *Super fast remote torrent and filehost downloads The app supports the main Premiumize features such as remote torrent downloads, and filehost grabbing.  *Magnet link handler:  Conveniently submit magnets to Premiumize by simply clicking on them  *Offline Mode Save files locally so you do not exhaust your data caps  *Darkmode You can change the color scheme to be more comfortable to the eyes
